university.name: Reedley College
university.description: Reedley College is a public community college offering academic and vocational programs to a diverse student population in Reedley, California.

majors.name: Liberal Studies
majors.description: Prepares students for transfer into elementary school teaching programs or public service careers.

majors.name: Accounting
majors.description: Focuses on financial reporting, auditing, and tax fundamentals for careers in business and finance.

organizations.name: Associated Student Government (ASG)
organizations.description: Student government representing the voice of students and managing student activities.

organizations.name: Music Ensembles
organizations.description: Open to all students; includes Choir, Concert Band, and Orchestra.

events.name: Student Senate Meetings
events.description: Open meetings for all students to attend and participate in student government.

events.name: Annual Music Performances
events.description: Concerts and performances by student ensembles on and off campus.
